CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper December 29, 1951, pg. 13, reads: "Budding Artist - A Promising Art Student and Her Work - Top left: Here's Peggy going home after a hard day's work at school... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Peggy Owens (Skillen) wearing fur coat and circular pendant necklace, walking down stairs with sculpture and large pillars in background, Carnegie Tech (Carnegie Mellon University)
